audio_file: RTP - Financial Difficulty_Christine Arcilla_ARLON ALBES ONG_618281831890_2025-03-15_11.56.56.wav

transcription.text: Hello po, good morning. Arlon Alves Ong. Hello sir. Magandang umaga sir, this is Christine from EMC Collections. On behalf of Maya Bank, over the recorded line, for account security lamang Arlon, yung last for mobile number on your Maya credit, 4748. Okay, confirm po. Okay, confirm. So upon checking on your account, you are past yun ng 3 days, amounting na lamang po, 3,231.75 centavos. Naka-proc settle na po ng payment sir?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Apo, magkano po yung sinettle yung payment sir?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Sa inyong IAPS po kayo nagbayad?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay po. So sige sir, salamat po sa pagtanggap sa tawag at sa pagbabayad po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Thank you and have a nice day po. Thank you.
transcription.speaker: spk2

translation.tagalog: Hello po, good morning. Arlon Alves Ong. Hello sir. Magandang umaga sir, this is Christine from EMC Collections. On behalf of Maya Bank, over the recorded line, for account security lamang Arlon, yung last for mobile number on your Maya credit, 4748. Okay, confirm po. Okay, confirm. So upon checking on your account, you are past yun ng 3 days, amounting na lamang po, 3,231.75 centavos. Naka-proc settle na po ng payment sir?
translation.english: Hello, good morning, this is Arlene from the M.E.C. Collections, on behalf of the M.E.C. Collections, over the recorded line, for account security only, Arlene, the last for mobile number on your M.E.C. credit, 4748.

translation.tagalog: Apo, magkano po yung sinettle yung payment sir?
translation.english: Grandpa, how much is the payment, sir?

translation.tagalog: Sa inyong IAPS po kayo nagbayad?
translation.english: Did you pay for your IAPS?

translation.tagalog: Okay po. So sige sir, salamat po sa pagtanggap sa tawag at sa pagbabayad po.
translation.english: Okay. So okay sir, thank you for accepting the call and for paying.

translation.tagalog: Thank you and have a nice day po. Thank you.
translation.english: Thank you and have a nice day. Thank you.
